bd135b70010fdccd397f317ce1ca1392 (02:59): OK... whats a better solution to restart a service, either A. System.ServiceProcess.Start() then try System.ServiceProcess.Stop() until it works, or B. spawn process net stop <service> net start <service>?
8768516d0d5cc75769ca93adefdd94b5 (03:00): subanark  I think there's a restart...
8768516d0d5cc75769ca93adefdd94b5 (03:00): And you have to wait for the process to stop before you want to send it a start...
8768516d0d5cc75769ca93adefdd94b5 (03:01): Get the handle to the serviceprocess...  I'm just doing it from memory, but I thought it was there.
bd135b70010fdccd397f317ce1ca1392 (03:01): I wait for 1/2 second. I had a loop to catch an exception and retry twice, but that wasn't enough, 10 was
bd135b70010fdccd397f317ce1ca1392 (03:02): http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.serviceprocess.servicecontroller_members.aspx (I don't see Restart)
8768516d0d5cc75769ca93adefdd94b5 (03:03): Okay, then my memory is wrong.
8768516d0d5cc75769ca93adefdd94b5 (03:03): Call stop, then start
8768516d0d5cc75769ca93adefdd94b5 (03:03): That's what the class is there for
bd135b70010fdccd397f317ce1ca1392 (03:03): I do and get an exception
8768516d0d5cc75769ca93adefdd94b5 (03:03): Waht's the excpetion
bd135b70010fdccd397f317ce1ca1392 (03:04): "Cannot start service wuauserv on computer ."
8768516d0d5cc75769ca93adefdd94b5 (03:05): I'd bet you have the anme of the service wrong
8768516d0d5cc75769ca93adefdd94b5 (03:05): It may take the long name...
bd135b70010fdccd397f317ce1ca1392 (03:05): Since I stop it using the same object I dout it
8768516d0d5cc75769ca93adefdd94b5 (03:05): Oh, I bet you need to wait for it to finish stopping
bd135b70010fdccd397f317ce1ca1392 (03:06): Oh how do I do that?
8768516d0d5cc75769ca93adefdd94b5 (03:06): check the state of the service
bd135b70010fdccd397f317ce1ca1392 (03:06): Oh nm ServiceControler.WaitForStatus
8768516d0d5cc75769ca93adefdd94b5 (03:06): One of the properties is the state, wait for it to be out of stopPending...
8768516d0d5cc75769ca93adefdd94b5 (03:06): There ya go!
